name: PriceSpider | Where_To_Buy
description: As a Solutions Developer at PriceSpider I was responsible for the design, development, and installation of the Where To Buy interface on client websites. I was also responsible for ensuring the fidelity of the data collected from clients, troubleshooting data propagation issues in SQL and MongoDB, and integrating the platform with Google Analytics.

name: Metronics | Business_Management_Software
description: As a Software Developer at Metronics I designed, developed, and deployed business management software that allowed for the digitization of customer, service job, and inventory records to allow for quick and easy lookup of critical business information.

name: Metronics | Company_Website
description: I created the company's first ever website to help increase their sales revenue by showcasing their equipment offerings online, and also to improve the customer experience when scheduling service jobs by providing an online request form.
